description.name: 9pcs torx impact sockets set T20-T70
description.long_desc:
Set of impact Torx socket wrenches made of high-quality chrome-molybdenum steel (Cr-Mo). The set includes 9 pieces of socket wrenches in sizes T20-T70. The sockets with a 1/2" drive are designed for heavy-duty work with impact wrenches providing high torque. They will perform exceptionally well in a professional automotive workshop.


Product characteristics:



  • Made of Cr-Mo steel, which due to significantly increased impact resistance is particularly suitable for heavy-duty work.

  • Set includes 9 Torx socket wrenches in sizes T20-T70.

  • Equipped with a drive socket suitable for 1/2" drive wrenches.

  • The entire set is packed in a convenient plastic case.


Technical specification:


Material: chrome-molybdenum steel (Cr-Mo)


Number of pieces in the set: 9


Socket sizes: T20, T25, T30, T40, T45, T50, T55, T60, T70


Application: heavy-duty work (e.g., impact wrenches)

description.name: 3in1 hot knife styrofoam cutte 9W
description.long_desc:
Our versatile 9W 3-in-1 thermal cutter for styrofoam is an indispensable tool for cutting shapes from foam and styrofoam. Here are its key features:



  1. Interchangeable cutting wire tip: Allows precise cutting of insulation materials, including styrofoam. Heats up in just 5 seconds.

  2. Interchangeable long knife tip: Ideal for cutting larger elements.

  3. Engraving tip: Creates decorative patterns on the styrofoam surface.


Additionally, the set includes a base and a spare cutting wire. This tool is powered by electricity, making it ready for use at any time.


Sample applications:



  • Cutting shapes for architectural modeling.

  • Creating decorations for holiday foam ornaments.

  • Making precise holes in styrofoam.

description.name: Weed snatcher
description.long_desc:
Our weed and grass scraper is characterized by its lightness and simplicity of construction. It can be used on various surfaces such as sidewalks, driveways, paths, curbs, or patios. It is equipped with a universal handle with a screw for mounting the shaft, which ensures ease of use. The stable, metal head with a long hook allows for effective removal of weeds along with their roots. An additional advantage is the wheels, which facilitate work. Thanks to them, weeding does not require working on your knees or bending over. What's more, our weed and grass scraper does not require the use of chemical agents, making it an environmentally friendly solution.


Product Characteristics:



  • Lightness and simplicity of construction.

  • Can be used on various surfaces such as sidewalks, driveways, paths, curbs, or patios.

  • Equipped with a universal handle with a screw for mounting the shaft, ensuring ease of use.

  • Stable, metal head with a long hook allows for effective removal of weeds along with their roots.

  • Wheels that facilitate work, thanks to them, weeding does not require working on your knees or bending over.

  • Does not require the use of chemical agents, making it an environmentally friendly solution

description.name: Garden greenhouse 3x2x2m UV
description.long_desc:
Nasza szklarnia to idealne rozwiązanie dla każdego miłośnika ogrodnictwa. Wykonana z wytrzymałej foli, która jest odporna na działanie promieniowania UV, zapewnia optymalne warunki dla roślin w każdych warunkach pogodowych.

Tunel ogrodowy o wymiarach 3mx2mx2m daje wystarczająco dużo miejsca dla różnorodnych roślin. Dzięki temu możesz uprawiać swoje ulubione warzywa, zioła czy kwiaty bez obaw o ich bezpieczeństwo.

Co więcej, nasza szklarnia posiada dwa wejścia, które można łatwo zamknąć za pomocą zamka błyskawicznego. Dzięki temu masz łatwy dostęp do swoich roślin z obu stron, a jednocześnie zapewniasz im ochronę przed szkodnikami.

Specyfikacja techniczna:

Materiał wykonania: folia odporna na działanie promieniowania UV

Szerokość: 2 m

Długość: 3 m

Wysokość: 2 m

description.name: 16LED solar garden lamp set
description.long_desc:
Illuminate your garden, driveway, or pathway in a unique and eco-friendly way with our LED solar lamp. This energy-efficient solution not only lights up your space but also adds a distinctive character to it.


Product Features:



  • Eco-Friendly Solar Power: Harness free solar energy – the lamp charges during the day and automatically turns on at dusk thanks to the built-in dusk sensor.

  • 16 High-Efficiency LEDs: Provides intense, cool white light at a 120° angle, perfect for illuminating driveways, flowerbeds, pathways, and other garden features.

  • Weather Resistance: High-quality materials (PP, PC, stainless steel) ensure protection against dust, dirt, sand, and rain.

  • Ease of Use: A simple switch located underneath the lamp allows for manual operation. The lamp is ready to use immediately after being switched on.

  • Elegant Design: Perfectly complements any setting.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Keltin

  • Power Supply: Solar

  • Battery: 1 x AAA ni-mh 600 mAh

  • Dimensions: Width: 11.5 cm | Height: 13 cm | Disc Thickness: 1 cm

  • Weight: 0.11 kg

  • Material: PP, PC, stainless steel

  • Light Source: LED

  • Light Color: Cool white

  • Light Beam Angle: 120°

  • Switch: Yes (underneath the lamp)

  • Dusk Sensor: Yes

  • Color: Silver ring with a black center

  • Quantity in Package: 4 pcs

description.name: Platform hand truck 200kg
description.long_desc:
Platforma Transportowa marki GEKO - Wytrzymałość i Mobilność w Jednym

Szukasz niezawodnego rozwiązania do transportu ciężkich przedmiotów? Odkryj Platformę Transportową marki GEKO, zaprojektowaną z myślą o maksymalnej efektywności i trwałości.

Wykonana z najwyższej jakości 18mm płyty MDF, nasza platforma gwarantuje wytrzymałość nawet w najbardziej wymagających warunkach. Optymalne wymiary 490x290mm zapewniają wystarczająco dużo miejsca dla różnorodnych ładunków, jednocześnie zachowując kompaktowe rozmiary, idealne do manewrowania w ciasnych przestrzeniach.

Wyposażona w cztery koła skrętne, które zapewniają stabilność i bezpieczeństwo, umożliwiając łatwe transportowanie różnego rodzaju materiałów.

Maksymalny udźwig wynoszący aż 200kg - Niezależnie od tego, czy przewozisz sprzęt budowlany, pudełka magazynowe, czy meble, nasza platforma sprosta zadaniu.

Specyfikacja techniczna:

Materiał wykonania: płyta MDF o grubości 18 mm

Wymiary platformy: 490x290 mm

Koła: 4 – skrętne

Udźwig maksymalny: 200 kg

description.name: Collapsible rainwater tank 500L
description.long_desc:
A foldable rainwater tank with a capacity of 500 liters is an excellent solution for your garden. Made from durable PVC material, it is resistant to UV radiation, ensuring long-lasting durability. It is an ideal solution for any garden. The water collected in this way is perfect for watering plants and the lawn in your garden. Additionally, it will help you save on water bills.


Key features of the product:



  • 500-liter capacity: Large enough to store sufficient rainwater for watering plants or washing a car.

  • Sturdy frame: Made from durable ABS, it ensures stability and safety.

  • Height and diameter: The tank is 98 cm high and 80 cm in diameter, making it compact and easy to place anywhere.

  • Zip-closed lid: Convenient opening and closing of the lid, also equipped with a mesh to prevent larger debris, such as leaves, from entering.

  • Overflow valve: Located at the top of the tank to avoid overfilling.

  • Faucet and bottom valve: A practical faucet makes it easy to draw rainwater, and the bottom valve allows for connecting a garden hose.


Technical specifications:


Tank material: PVC, UV resistant


Frame: ABS


Dimensions (Dia. x H): 80 x 98 cm


Capacity: 500 liters


Connectors and fittings: 3/4”

  • Faucet and bottom valve: A practical faucet makes it easy to draw rainwater, and the bottom valve allows for connecting a garden hose.


Technical specifications:


Tank material: PVC, UV resistant


Frame: ABS


Dimensions (Dia. x H): 80 x 98 cm


Capacity: 500 liters


Connectors and fittings: 3/4”

description.name: Barrel style charcoal grill with cover - grate 71x45cm
description.long_desc:
The barrel-type charcoal grill by Geko is an excellent choice for anyone who appreciates traditional grilling with charcoal or briquettes. With this grill, your dishes will gain a unique taste and aroma of natural fire.


Product Features:



  • Large ash opening - ensures very good removal of burnt charcoal to the ash catcher. After grilling, it is recommended to scoop out the remaining accumulated ash from the bottom of the barrel to the ash catcher.

  • Large, convenient handle - the grill is equipped with large, sturdy steel handles that make it easy to move the device and open the lid.

  • Thermometer showing two temperatures - the product has a thermometer displaying the temperature in both degrees Celsius (°C) and Fahrenheit (°F) within the range from 0 to 400 °C and from 0 to 800 °F.

  • Grate handles - the set includes handles for the grate, making it easy to remove ready dishes from the grill without the risk of burns. The handles are separate parts, not permanently attached to the grate, so they can be kept under the grill and used when needed.

  • Removable ash catcher - an ash catcher with a diameter of 18 cm, which can be easily inserted and removed, allowing it to be emptied at any time.

  • Large wheels - The grill has large plastic wheels (diameter 15 cm) and sturdy handles, making it easy to move.

  • Folding shelves - Folding shelves allow for easy storage of the grill, even in small spaces. When the shelves are folded, the grill takes up less space, which is particularly useful in small gardens, balconies, or garages.

  • Lower shelf for accessories - Additional storage space: The lower shelf measuring 59 x 29 x 42 cm (with a height of 26 cm under the ash catcher) offers plenty of space for storing charcoal, briquettes, grilling tools, and other necessary accessories.


Dimensions of individual elements:



  • Narrow grate: 68 x 14 cm

  • Large grate: 71 x 35 cm

  • Small shelf: 22 x 35 cm

  • Large shelf: 63 x 22 cm

  • Lower shelf without ash catcher: 59 x 29 x 42 cm

  • Lower shelf under the ash catcher: 59 x 29 x 26 cm

  • Transport wheel [diameter]: 15 cm


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Material: steel, stainless steel, chrome steel

  • Grate finish: chrome-plated

  • Firebox finish: enamelled

  • Shape: cylindrical

  • Type: barrel

  • Fuel type: charcoal

  • Color: black

  • Thermometer: yes (temperature in °C and °F)

  • Air circulation control damper: 4 pieces

  • Ash catcher: yes (18 cm diameter)

  • Transport wheels: yes, 2 pieces with a diameter of 15 cm

  • Transport handle: yes

  • Main grate: 71 x 35 cm

  • Narrow grate: 68 x 14 cm

  • Charcoal grate: 70.5 x 27 cm

  • Foldable side shelf: 22 x 35 cm

  • Foldable front shelf: 63 x 22 cm

  • Lower shelf for accessories: 59 x 29 x 42 cm (59 x 29 x 26 cm with ash catcher installed)

  • Grate handles: yes

  • Depth of the lower part of the barrel: 19 cm

  • Weight: 16.2 kg

description.name: Charcoal grill with adjustable grate 40x40cm
description.long_desc:
The GEKO charcoal grill offers practical features such as side shelves and adjustable grill height, making grilling easier. With its solid construction and functional elements, it is a convenient and durable choice for any occasion.


Product Features:



  • Innovative lid closing mechanism - The grill lid is mounted on sturdy levers, allowing smooth up and down movements. This makes closing the lid effortless, and opening it is equally simple and convenient.

  • 14.5 cm diameter wheels ensure stability and smooth movement.

  • Practical storage space - The lower shelf under the grill grate offers significant space measuring 35.5 cm x 43 cm (max height 40 cm) for storing various grilling accessories and charcoal supplies.

  • Convenient grill height adjustment - The grill height adjustment system is operated with a convenient external knob, allowing quick and precise adjustment of the grill position without needing to open the grill lid.

  • Air circulation control shutter - The air circulation control shutter allows precise control over the charcoal's heat level. By opening and closing the shutter, the user can regulate the amount of air entering the firebox.

  • Side shelves with handle function - Our charcoal grill is equipped with two side shelves measuring 20.5 x 43 cm, which also serve as handles.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Material: Enamel-coated sheet metal, wood, chrome-plated steel, plastic

  • Product dimensions when assembled (width x depth x height): 96 x 50 x 90 cm

  • Grill size: 40 x 40 cm

  • Height adjustment: 3.5 cm

  • Charcoal grate size: 33 x 33 cm

  • Bowl size: 46 x 46 x 13 cm

  • Lower shelf size: 35 x 43 cm x 40 cm

  • Side shelf size: 20.5 x 43 cm

  • Wheel diameter: 14.5 cm

  • Product weight: 8.2 kg

description.name: Round charcoal grill with cover - grate diameter 39cm
description.long_desc:
Round charcoal grill, ideal for outdoor grilling enthusiasts. Our product stands out for its solid construction and thoughtful design, ensuring long-lasting use and ease of operation.


Product Features:



  • Chrome-plated steel grate with two handles - Two sturdy handles make it easy to handle the grate. They allow for safe and easy transport and control of the grate's position on the grill.

  • Convenient lower shelf - The lower shelf measuring 33 x 30 cm is also ideal for storing a bag of charcoal or briquettes. The lower shelf is perfect for storing various grilling accessories.

  • Galvanized ash catcher - The ash catcher effectively collects ash generated during grilling, significantly easing maintenance. The collected ash can be easily removed, allowing for quick and convenient preparation of the grill for the next use.

  • Air circulation control damper - The air circulation control damper allows precise control over the charcoal's level of embers. By opening and closing the damper, the user can regulate the amount of air entering the firebox.

  • Waterproof cover included - The set includes a large waterproof cover that protects the entire grill during breaks in use and off-season.

  • Two solid plastic wheels - Our charcoal grill is equipped with two durable transport wheels with a diameter of 14.5 cm, which greatly facilitate its movement and handling.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Geko

  • Color: Black

  • Type: Charcoal

  • Model: Round with lid

  • Product size: 47 x 44 x 73 cm

  • Grate height: 59 cm

  • Grate diameter: 41 cm

  • Lower shelf size: 33 x 30 cm

  • Firebox (bowl) depth: 15 cm

  • Wheel diameter: 14.5 cm

  • Ash catcher diameter: 29 cm

  • Weight: 2.5 kg

  • Weight with packaging: 2.9 kg

  • Grill mounted on two plastic wheels with a diameter of 14.5 cm

description.name: 21V cordless pruning shears 30mm 2x2.0Ah
description.long_desc:
Take care of your garden like a pro with the John Gardener cordless pruner — a reliable tool that combines power, precision, and comfort. This device is designed for those who value efficiency, time savings, and ergonomic use, regardless of their level of gardening experience.


Technical Specifications:



  • Maximum Power: 800 W

  • Battery Voltage: 21 V

  • Battery Capacity: 2.0 Ah (x2)

  • Operating Time: 4–5 hours

  • Charging Time: 1.5 hours

  • Max. Cutting Diameter: 30 mm

  • Blade Type: High-carbon steel


Unmatched Power – Up to 800W!


Equipped with a powerful 800W motor, this pruner delivers smooth and fast cutting of branches up to 30 mm thick. It’s perfect for trimming fruit trees, ornamental shrubs, or hedges — whether in your backyard garden or at an allotment.


Long Operating Time – 2 x 2.0Ah Batteries Included


The set includes two 21V lithium-ion batteries with 2.0Ah capacity each, allowing for uninterrupted operation for up to 4–5 hours. When one runs out, simply swap it and keep working. Thanks to Power Share technology, the same batteries can be used with other tools in the series!


Fast Charging – Ready in Just 1.5 Hours


The included charger fully recharges the battery in only 90 minutes. That means less downtime and more time doing what you love.


Comfort and Safety at Work


The pruner features an ergonomic, non-slip handle and well-balanced design for a secure grip and reduced hand fatigue during extended use. An intuitive trigger provides precise blade control, and the sturdy housing protects the mechanism from dirt and damage.


Comprehensive Accessory Kit – Everything You Need


Alongside the tool and batteries, the set includes useful maintenance accessories: a sharpening stone for the blade, lubricating oil for the mechanism, and service wrenches. Everything comes neatly packed in a durable, stylish plastic case for easy storage and transport.


Pruner Applications:



  • Trimming branches of fruit trees and shrubs

  • Shaping hedges and ornamental bushes

  • Garden and orchard maintenance

  • Ideal for amateur and semi-professional use


Set Includes:



  • John Gardener 21V cordless pruner

  • 2x 21V 2.0Ah Li-Ion batteries

  • Mains charger

  • Durable plastic carrying case

  • Sharpening stone

  • Bottle of lubricating oil

  • Allen key and socket wrench for maintenance

description.name: 21V cordless chainsaw 2x2.0Ah – XXL set
description.long_desc:
Looking for a lightweight, handy, and efficient saw for work in the garden, orchard, or on your plot?
Choose reliability and convenience with the John Gardener cordless chainsaw. This compact yet powerful tool is perfect for trimming branches, cutting firewood, or shaping bushes. The set includes everything you need to get started — right out of the box!


Safety and Comfort at Work


The integrated safety lock prevents accidental start-up of the saw, while the special guide bar guard protects the user and the mechanism from debris. This tool is designed with both comfort and safety in mind.


Key Product Features:



  • 21V cordless power – No tangled cables, complete freedom of movement. Includes two 2.0Ah batteries for longer uninterrupted work.

  • 1000W power output – Perfect for home use, delivering smooth and fast cutting.

  • Chain speed of 10 m/s – Ensures efficient performance even with harder wood.

  • 6-inch (approx. 15 cm) guide bar – Great for branches with a maximum cutting diameter of up to 100 mm.

  • Ergonomic, non-slip handle – Comfortable and secure grip, even during longer tasks.

  • Guide bar guard + safety lock – Work safely without the risk of accidental activation.

  • Protective glasses included in the set


Technical Specifications:


Power type: Cordless (Li-Ion 21V)


Battery capacity: 2x 2.0Ah


Guide bar length: 6 inches (15 cm)


Max cutting diameter: 100 mm


Maximum power: 1000 W


Chain speed: 10 m/s


Ideal for:



  • Branch trimming

  • Cutting firewood

  • Garden and orchard work

  • Home and hobby use


Included in the set:



  • John Gardener G80665 cordless chainsaw

  • 2x 21V 2.0Ah Li-Ion batteries

  • Fast charger

  • 6" guide bar

  • chain

  • Protective glasses

  • Screwdriver + assembly wrench

  • Handy carrying case

Choose reliability and convenience with the John Gardener cordless chainsaw. This compact yet powerful tool is perfect for trimming branches, cutting firewood, or shaping bushes. The set includes everything you need to get started — right out of the box!


Safety and Comfort at Work


The integrated safety lock prevents accidental start-up of the saw, while the special guide bar guard protects the user and the mechanism from debris. This tool is designed with both comfort and safety in mind.


Key Product Features:



  • 21V cordless power – No tangled cables, complete freedom of movement. Includes two 2.0Ah batteries for longer uninterrupted work.

  • 1000W power output – Perfect for home use, delivering smooth and fast cutting.

  • Chain speed of 10 m/s – Ensures efficient performance even with harder wood.

  • 6-inch (approx. 15 cm) guide bar – Great for branches with a maximum cutting diameter of up to 100 mm.

  • Ergonomic, non-slip handle – Comfortable and secure grip, even during longer tasks.

  • Guide bar guard + safety lock – Work safely without the risk of accidental activation.

  • Protective glasses included in the set


Technical Specifications:


Power type: Cordless (Li-Ion 21V)


Battery capacity: 2x 2.0Ah


Guide bar length: 6 inches (15 cm)


Max cutting diameter: 100 mm


Maximum power: 1000 W


Chain speed: 10 m/s


Ideal for:



  • Branch trimming

  • Cutting firewood

  • Garden and orchard work

  • Home and hobby use


Included in the set:



  • John Gardener G80665 cordless chainsaw

  • 2x 21V 2.0Ah Li-Ion batteries

  • Fast charger

  • 6" guide bar

  • chain

  • Protective glasses

  • Screwdriver + assembly wrench

  • Handy carrying case

description.name: Glue mouse trap
description.long_desc:
Looking for an effective and safe way to get rid of mice and rats? The Keltin mouse and rat glue trap is the perfect solution! With a special scent dispenser located in the center of the trap, rodents are attracted to the trap and effectively immobilized once they step on it. Our trap is completely safe, free from toxins and poisons, making it an excellent choice for places where chemical pest control methods are not advisable.


Key Features:



  • Environmentally Safe: An eco-friendly trap that does not harm the natural environment.

  • High Effectiveness: Strong adhesive effectively attracts and immobilizes rodents, including larger rats.

  • Ease of Use: Simple to set up and effective, even in hard-to-reach areas where other traps fail.

  • Durability and Strength: The adhesive is strong, durable, and ensures that trapped rodents cannot escape.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Keltin

  • Dimensions (expanded trap): 17 x 23 cm

  • Dimensions (folded trap): 17 x 11.5 cm

  • Quantity per package: 1 piece


With the Keltin glue trap, you will effectively and environmentally address your rodent problem. Ideal for use in homes, offices, warehouses, and other places where safety and effectiveness are priorities.

description.name: Strong classic mouse trap
description.long_desc:
Eliminate your rodent problem once and for all with our mouse trap. Experience its reliability and effectiveness, proven through years of intensive use and testing. This is the most recognizable type of rodent trap: the classic snap trap.


Product Features:



  • Snap Mechanism: Equipped with a strong snap mechanism that ensures quick and decisive action. Rodents don't stand a chance of escaping.

  • High-Quality Materials: Made from durable, damage-resistant materials, ensuring long-lasting functionality.

  • Specialized Design: The ergonomic design allows for effective mouse capture while making the trap easy to handle and clean.

  • Ease of Use: Intuitive operation – simply set the trap and place the bait, and the mechanism will take care of the rest.

  • Reusable: Designed for multiple uses, making it a cost-effective solution over time.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Keltin

  • Length: 10 cm

  • Width: 5 cm

  • Height when Opened: 5.5 cm

description.name: 2pcs human live catch mouse trap
description.long_desc:
The mouse trap is designed for the effective and humane capture of rodents. It is ideal for use in various environments such as households, warehouses, and industrial facilities. Featuring an innovative mechanism, the trap allows mice to enter but effectively prevents them from escaping.


Applications:



  • Households: Perfect for home use, especially in areas where rodent problems are frequent.

  • Warehouses and Industrial Facilities: Proven effective in larger spaces, ideal for capturing rodents in warehouses and other large facilities.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Keltin

  • Humane rodent control method

  • Mechanism: Specialized system that allows the mouse to enter and prevents escape

  • Base Dimensions: 19 cm x 6 cm

  • Height: 7 cm

  • Color: Transparent green

  • Material: High-quality, durable, and damage-resistant plastic

  • Quantity per Pack: 2 traps

description.name: Human live catch mouse trap
description.long_desc:
Introducing our sturdy metal live trap – the ultimate solution in humane rodent control. Made from high-quality galvanized steel, this durable trap withstands time and weather conditions, ensuring long-lasting effectiveness against unwanted pests. With the innovative large viewer, you can easily monitor captured rodents without unnecessary trap opening.


Our live trap offers many advantages:



  • Humane: It does not harm captured rodents, allowing for their later release.

  • Safe: For humans, pets, and the captured rodents.

  • Easy to use: Very simple to set up, saving time and effort.

  • Reusable: Can be used multiple times, making it an eco-friendly solution.

description.name: Electric fly swatter
description.long_desc:
The electric bug zapper is an effective tool for eliminating flies, mosquitoes, moths, and wasps. The device is equipped with a metal grid that, when the handle button is pressed, generates a 1500V charge, effectively neutralizing insects.


Thanks to the ergonomic handle and easy-to-use button, operating the zapper is intuitive and convenient. The zapper is made of durable plastic, ensuring long-lasting use and easy maintenance. Ideal for use in the home, on the patio, or in the garden, providing protection against troublesome insects.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Keltin

  • Power: 3 W

  • Material: Plastic

  • Grid Voltage: 1500V

  • Power Supply: 2x AA batteries

  • Working Dimensions: Width 16 cm, Height 19.5 cm

  • Overall Dimensions: Width 18 cm, Length 46 cm

  • Color: Yellow with black handle

  • Additional Information: Solid case included.

description.name: 4pcs 80cm sticky fly paper
description.long_desc:
```html

Fly Sticky Trap Length: 80 cm, designed for effective indoor control of flies and other insects. The set includes 4 traps that are safe for health, as they do not contain any insecticides.


The trap attracts all flies from the surrounding area with a special attractant. Once lured, the flies land on the sticky surface and have no chance of escape. Our product uses a very strong, non-drying adhesive – therefore, we recommend hanging the trap at a height to avoid contact with pets or children.


Application: Ideal for indoor use in areas with a high concentration of insects, such as kitchens, pantries, or other living spaces.


Instructions for Use:



  1. Hold the ribbon in one hand and the adhesive tube in the other.

  2. Slowly pull the ribbon with a twisting motion to unwind the trap.

  3. Hang the trap using the provided hook in the desired location.

  4. Pull the tube down to expose the entire sticky surface.


Technical Specifications:



  • Manufacturer: Keltin

  • Trap Length: 80 cm

  • Quantity in Set: 4 pieces

  • Type of Adhesive: Non-drying, resistant to external conditions

  • Application: Indoor use

  • Attractant: Strong attractant to lure insects

  • Safety: No insecticides, safe for children and pets (recommended to hang out of reach due to strong adhesive)


```

description.name: Exhaust hanger removal pliers 285mm
description.long_desc:
These exhaust hanger removal pliers with a length of 285mm are indispensable tools for automotive mechanics, providing reliability and precision during exhaust hanger removal.


Specifications:



  • Length: 285mm

  • Material: Durable steel with a rubber coating on the handle

  • Functionality: The pliers are designed for efficient and safe removal of exhaust hangers without the risk of damage.

  • Construction: Solid construction made of high-quality steel ensures the reliability and durability of the tool even under heavy use.

  • Application: Ideal for use in automotive workshops, repair shops, and by automotive enthusiasts.

  • Ergonomic Handles: Ergonomically designed handles provide a comfortable grip and precise control during use.

  • Safety: The pliers ensure safe and stable removal of exhaust hangers, minimizing the risk of damage to the vehicle or the tool itself.

  • Versatility: Suitable for various sizes of exhaust hangers, making them versatile and adaptable for use.

description.name: Foam sprayer 2L
description.long_desc:
The 2-in-1 garden pressure sprayer and foam generator is a versatile tool equipped with two interchangeable nozzles, allowing smooth switching between different tasks.


The standard nozzle is perfect for plant spraying, providing them with proper care. The special nozzle allows you to transform the sprayer into a foam generator, which works great for washing cars, among other applications. The transparent 2-liter tank enables easy monitoring of the liquid level. Made of high-quality plastic, this equipment is designed to serve you for a long time.


Product Features:



  • Made of durable plastic

  • Transparent 2-liter tank

  • 2-in-1 device: functions perfectly as a manual garden sprayer, and after attaching the special nozzle included in the set, it turns into an extremely practical foam generator, ideal for car washing

description.name: Polishing pad Type 100mm M10
description.long_desc:
Dysk do tarcz polerskich i papierów ściernych. Piankowy podkład zastosowany w dysku dopasowuje się do obrabianego elementu, co pozwala w precyzyjny sposób wypolerować (wyszlifować) nierówne powierzchnie.

Charakterystyka produktu:

  • średnica dysku: 100mm
  • mocowanie tarcz: rzep
  • mocowanie dysku: Gwint M10

description.name: Gasoline blower JG
description.long_desc:
The gasoline leaf blower is an indispensable tool for anyone looking to maintain order in their garden. Powered by a 25.4 cc gasoline engine with a nominal power of 1 HP, it offers excellent performance and reliability. This device is capable of generating an airspeed of 225 km/h, making it effective and quick at removing leaves and more. The blower features a 700 ml fuel tank, ensuring long-lasting operation without frequent refueling. Additionally, the device offers a maximum rotational speed of 7500 rpm.


Applications:



  • Removing leaves from various surfaces

  • Clearing cut grass remnants

  • Blowing loose snow off cars, sidewalks, and driveways

  • Removing trimmed hedge debris


This indispensable device is perfect for anyone who wants to keep not only their garden but also other surfaces clean. Ideal for removing grass remnants or hedge clippings from paving stones, it provides efficiency and convenience in various applications. In winter, it can also be used to remove loose snow from cars, sidewalks, and driveways.


Product Features:


25.4 cc, 1 HP Gasoline Engine



  • Performance and Reliability: The engine provides sufficient power for effective work in various garden conditions.

  • High Efficiency: Perfect for quickly and effectively removing leaves, grass, and other debris.


Airspeed: 225 km/h



  • Effectiveness: High airspeed allows for fast and efficient cleaning of large areas from leaves and other debris.

  • Versatility: Can be used on various surfaces such as lawns, sidewalks, and paving stones.


700 ml Fuel Tank



  • Long-Lasting Operation: The large tank capacity allows for long work sessions without frequent refueling.

  • User Convenience: Fewer interruptions during work increase operational efficiency.


Maximum Rotational Speed: 7500 rpm



  • Efficiency: High rotational speed ensures quick and effective debris removal.


Versatile Applications



  • Garden and Other Surfaces: Effective not only in the garden but also on other surfaces like paving stones.

  • Removing Grass and Hedge Clippings: Excellent for cleaning up after garden work.

  • Winter Applications: Can be used to remove loose snow from cars, sidewalks, and driveways, enhancing its year-round utility.


Technical Specifications:


Engine: Two-stroke E134FB


Displacement: 25.4 cc


Nominal Power: 1 HP


Fuel Mixture: 1:25


Maximum Rotational Speed: 7500 rpm


Fuel Tank Capacity: 700 ml


Airspeed: 60 m/s (225 km/h)


Additional Information: The set includes a fuel mixture preparation tank, spark plug wrench, and a double-sided screwdriver.


Brief product presentation:


https://www.youtube.com/shorts/MuWc6pn3tyw
